clues.text: Ill tidings cover ground quickly
Battle combustion by using combustion
Excuse this person, lad, could yonder object be a train to Tennessee's 4th largest city?
clues.response: Pardon me, boy, but is that the Chattanooga Choo Choo

clues.text:
Precipitation, precipitation,
disappear,
return on a different 1/365 of a year
clues.response: rain, rain, go away, please come again another day

clues.text: Homo sapiens bids, the supreme being rids

The conflicted Ben Solo/Kylo Ren, 2015, 2017 & 2019
Gandalf, sometimes grey, sometimes white, 6 times starting in 2001
Dominic Toretto, 7 times so far since 2001
Pete "Maverick" Mitchell, 1986 & 2022

clues.response: the Poet Laureate of the United States

Deflated like one flapjack

clues.response: never give a sucker an even break

clues.text: In song, it's Chicago's "Great Street" where "they do things they don't do on Broadway"

rounds.text: At the 1865 Paris Art Salon, the elder of these 2 men said if the younger were successful, it would be "because his name sounds like mine"
